Hot Reload in Flutter
examples.example:
Hot reload rebuilds the UI quickly after code changes.

```dart
// After code changes, press 'r' in the console to hot reload.
```

examples.name: MaterialApp Widget
Scaffold Widget
examples.example:
Provides a basic layout with **appBar** and **body**.

```dart
Scaffold(
  appBar: AppBar(title: Text('Scaffold Example')), // Top bar
  body: Center(child: Text('Hello')),            // Main content
);
```

examples.name: AppBar Widget
Container Widget
examples.example:
A box with padding, margin, and color properties.

```dart
Container(
  padding: EdgeInsets.all(16.0), // Inner padding
  margin: EdgeInsets.all(8.0),   // Outer margin
  color: Colors.blue,            // Background color
  child: Text('Container Example'), // Child widget
);
```

examples.name: Row and Column
Text Widget
examples.example:
Displays text with styling.

```dart
Text(
  'Hello, Flutter!',            // Display text
  style: TextStyle(fontSize: 20), // Font size
);
```

examples.name: Image Widget
Icon Widget
examples.example:
Displays an icon from the material icons set.

```dart
Icon(
  Icons.favorite, // Icon symbol
  color: Colors.red, // Icon color
  size: 30.0,      // Icon size
);
```

ListTile Widget
examples.example:
A pre-designed row widget for list items.

```dart
ListTile(
  leading: Icon(Icons.label),          // Icon on the left
  title: Text('ListTile Example'),       // Main text
  trailing: Icon(Icons.arrow_forward),   // Icon on the right
);
```

examples.name: Expanded Widget
Flexible Widget
Padding Widget
examples.example:
Adds padding around a widget.

```dart
Padding(
  padding: EdgeInsets.all(16.0), // Uniform padding
  child: Text('Padded Text'),
);
```

examples.name: Align Widget
examples.example:
Aligns a child widget within its parent.

```dart
Align(
  alignment: Alignment.topRight, // Position at top right
  child: Text('Aligned Text'),
);
```

examples.name: Stack Widget
Positioned in Stack
FutureBuilder Widget
StreamBuilder Widget
CustomPaint Widget
Animation Basics
Hero Animation
SliverAppBar
SafeArea Widget
ConstrainedBox
examples.example:
Apply size constraints to a widget using **ConstrainedBox**.

```dart
ConstrainedBox(
  constraints: BoxConstraints(minWidth: 100, minHeight: 100), // Minimum size
  child: Container(color: Colors.purple),
);
```

examples.name: AspectRatio Widget
examples.example:
Maintain a specific aspect ratio for a widget.

```dart
AspectRatio(
  aspectRatio: 16/9, // 16:9 ratio
  child: Container(color: Colors.teal),
);
```

examples.name: Opacity Widget
examples.example:
Control the transparency of a widget using **Opacity**.

```dart
Opacity(
  opacity: 0.5, // 50% transparent
  child: Container(color: Colors.black),
);
```

examples.name: ClipRRect Widget
examples.example:
Clip a widget with rounded corners using **ClipRRect**.

```dart
ClipRRect(
  borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(8.0), // Rounded corners
  child: Image.network('https://example.com/image.png'),
);
```

examples.name: Placeholder Widget
examples.example:
Display a temporary widget during development using **Placeholder**.

```dart
Placeholder(
  fallbackHeight: 100, // Height for placeholder
  fallbackWidth: 100,  // Width for placeholder
);
```

examples.name: Responsive Design
Localization
examples.example:
Support multiple languages using localization techniques.

```dart
// Use ARB files for localized strings and access them like this:
Text(AppLocalizations.of(context)!.helloWorld); // Display localized text
```

Wrap Widget
examples.example:
Arrange widgets in a flow layout using **Wrap**.

```dart
Wrap(
  spacing: 8.0, // Horizontal spacing
  runSpacing: 4.0, // Vertical spacing
  children: List.generate(5, (index) => Chip(label: Text('Item $index'))),
);
```

CircularProgressIndicator
examples.example:
Show progress with a circular indicator using **CircularProgressIndicator**.

```dart
CircularProgressIndicator(); // Indeterminate progress
```

examples.name: RefreshIndicator
Draggable and DragTarget
ReorderableListView
Custom Route Transitions
AnimatedSwitcher
AnimatedContainer
examples.example:
Animate container properties with **AnimatedContainer**.

```dart
AnimatedContainer(
  duration: Duration(seconds: 1),
  width: 100,
  height: 100,
  color: Colors.red,
);
```

examples.name: AnimatedOpacity
examples.example:
Animate changes in opacity with **AnimatedOpacity**.

```dart
AnimatedOpacity(
  duration: Duration(seconds: 1),
  opacity: 0.5, // Target opacity
  child: Container(color: Colors.blue, width: 100, height: 100),
);
```

examples.name: AnimatedCrossFade
examples.example:
Smoothly transition between two children with **AnimatedCrossFade**.

```dart
AnimatedCrossFade(
  duration: Duration(seconds: 1),
  firstChild: Container(color: Colors.red, width: 100, height: 100),
  secondChild: Container(color: Colors.green, width: 100, height: 100),
  crossFadeState: CrossFadeState.showFirst, // Toggle state
);
```

Visibility Widget
examples.example:
Show or hide a widget with **Visibility**.

```dart
Visibility(
  visible: true, // Toggle visibility
  child: Text('Now you see me'),
);
```

examples.name: Offstage Widget
examples.example:
Remove a widget from layout but keep its state using **Offstage**.

```dart
Offstage(
  offstage: false, // When true, widget is hidden
  child: Text('Offstage Widget'),
);
```

examples.name: FittedBox Widget
examples.example:
Scale and position a child widget within available space using **FittedBox**.

```dart
FittedBox(
  fit: BoxFit.contain,
  child: Text('Scaled Text'),
);
```
